## Enhancements made

- üìÑ Add `toc` node to render table of contents in Typst and LaTeX [#2266](https://github.com/jupyter-book/mystmd/pull/2266) ([`@joequant`](https://github.com/joequant), [`@rowanc1`](https://github.com/rowanc1), [`@changeset`-bot](https://github.com/changeset-bot))
- üê™ Enable alternate YAML build config [#2219](https://github.com/jupyter-book/mystmd/pull/2219) ([`@brianhawthorne`](https://github.com/brianhawthorne), [`@fwkoch`](https://github.com/fwkoch), [`@rowanc1`](https://github.com/rowanc1), [`@changeset`-bot](https://github.com/changeset-bot), [`@stefanv`](https://github.com/stefanv))
